sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Former Pope Benedict XVI, the first pontiff in 600 years to resign from the job, has died aged 95.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Benedict stunned the world in 2013 when he announced that he no longer had the strength to run the 1.2 billion strong Catholic Church that he had steered for eight years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: His dramatic decision paved the way for the election of Pope Francis as his successor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The two popes then lived side by side in the Vatican Gardens, an unprecedented arrangement which may allow future popes emeritus, meaning retired popes, to do the same.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: February 2013, and Pope Benedict XVI shocks the world,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: announcing his resignation, the first leader of the Catholic Church to step down in 600 years but at 85 years old he said his strength had diminished he said he'd asked God to help him make the right decision I'm now retiring to a life of prayer I will always be close to all of you and I'm sure all of you will be close to me even though I remain hidden to the world." German Cardinal Joseph Ratzinger became known to the world on 19 April 2005.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Prior to that, he spent 24 years heading the congregation for the doctrine of the faith.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: His staunch defence of Catholic orthodoxy, his opposition to abortion, euthanasia and gay marriage led to his nickname, God's Rottweiler.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After the great Pope John Paul II, the cardinals have elected me, a simple, humble worker in the Lord's vineyard.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Benedict championed Christianity's European roots throughout his papacy, but it was this 2006 speech that angered the Muslim world, when the late pontiff appeared to suggest that Islam was inherently violent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: His comments sparked protests in a number of Muslim countries. Benedict would later apologize and the Vatican promptly organized a number of papal visits across the Islamic world in a bid to restore harmonious interfaith relations. But controversy continued to dog Benedict's tenure. Jewish groups opposed his moves to support the beatification of Pope Pius XII, a man accused of not raising his voice against the genocide of Europe's Jews at the hands of the Nazis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Benedict himself was a member of the Hitler Youth, joining as a 14-year-old. But research by the Simon Wiesenthal Center found that Benedict's family were strongly opposed to the Nazi regime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Yet questions of anti-Semitism were raised again when the pontiff lifted the excommunication of four bishops. One of them was Britain's Richard Williamson, who repeatedly denied the Holocaust.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I believe there were no gas chambers, yes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But it was a flood of lawsuits on child sex abuse cases between 2008 and 2010 that left the Catholic Church facing its biggest crisis in decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Benedict offered unprecedented apologies, but according to his critics, he failed to take real action.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Colleagues praised his methodical mind and his friends remembered him as shy but full of tenderness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: As 2022 draws to a close, fighting remains fierce around the besieged Ukrainian city of Bakhmut in Donbass region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The battle in the air is just as important as that on the ground this drone unit of ukraine's forces is just one plank of an increasing focus in this area ukraine's president vladimir zelensky said this year we have not only preserved our air defense we have made them stronger than ever but in the new year the Ukrainian air defense will become even stronger even more effective Ukrainian air defense can become the most powerful in Europe and it will guarantee security not only of our country but also for the entire continent meanwhile Kyiv's forces have been training near Ukraine's border with Belarus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tensions have been increasing between the two countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Amid speculation, Ukraine's northern neighbor could launch an invasion.
